package demopack;

public class sortarraydemo {

public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
     int a[]= {2,6,1,4,9};
     int temp;
     
// 1,2,3,4,6, 9
     
     for(int i=0;i<5;i++)
     {
    for(int j=i+1;j<5;j++)
    {
    if(a[i] > a[j])
    {
    temp=a[i];
    a[i]=a[j];
    a[j]=temp;
    
    }
    }
     }
for(int i=0;i<5;i++)
{
System.out.println(a[i]);
}



/* int a= 5;
int b =4;
/*int temp;
temp=a;
a=b;
b=temp;
System.out.println(a);
System.out.println(b);
// Swap with out variable

a=a+b;  // a= 9
b=a-b;  //b = 5
a=a-b; // a= 4  */



      
      

}

}
